Detailed Description

Class for getting input spikes.

This class abstract methods for getting the input spikes to the network. Its subclasses implements the input source and methods.

Author:
Jesus Garrido

Richard Carrillo

Date:
August 2008

virtual void InputSpikeDriver::LoadInputs ( EventQueue *  Queue,
Network *  Net 
) throw (EDLUTException) [pure virtual]

It introduces the input activity in the simulation event queue.

This method introduces the cumulated input activity in the simulation event queue.

Parameters:
Queue The event queue where the input spikes are inserted.
Net The network associated to the input spikes.
Exceptions:
EDLUTException If something wrong happens in the input process.

Implemented in FileInputSpikeDriver, TCPIPInputOutputSpikeDriver, and TCPIPInputSpikeDriver.

It checks if the input process is finished.

It checks if the input process is finished.

Returns:
True if the inputs have been finished. False in other case.
